arts.ttl: Marco Rose relieved after RB Leipzig’s German Cup win
arts.sum: Marco Rose is under pressure at RB Leipzig, but the head coach is “very happy” man after his side secured a place in the DFB Pokal semi-final after beating fellow…

arts.ttl: RB Leipzig and Wolfsburg react to controversial penalty
arts.sum: RB Leipzig secured their place in the DFB Pokal semi-final with a 1-0 win against Wolfsburg on Wednesday night, but the result came with controversy. Benjamin Sesko shot from close…

arts.ttl: Sesko penalty sees Leipzig book semi-final spot
arts.sum: RB Leipzig secured their place in the DFB-Pokal semi-finals after a Benjamin Sesko penalty saw die Roten Bullen beat Wolfsburg 1-0.

arts.ttl: RB Leipzig vs Wolfsburg: Confirmed lineups
arts.sum: RB Leipzig host Wolfsburg in the last of the DFB Pokal quarter-finals tonight. Marco Rose has made four changes to the team that played out a 2-2 draw against Heidenheim…

arts.ttl: Confirmed lineups: RB Leipzig vs VfL Wolfsburg, DFB-Pokal quarter final
arts.sum: The lineups have been announced ahead of RB Leipzig's DFB-Pokal quarter-final against VfL Wolfsburg at Red Bull Arena.

arts.ttl: Ducksch out, Schmid "unlikely" to face VfL Wolfsburg
arts.sum: Some grave news regarding two of Bremen's best players was released earlier this afternoon.

arts.ttl: Leipzig risk losing several key players if they miss out on Champions League
arts.sum: RB Leipzig will be forced to cash in on key players if they miss out on Champions League qualification.

arts.ttl: Rose given four Bundesliga games to save RB Leipzig job
arts.sum: Marco Rose has been given four Bundesliga games to save his job at RB Leipzig, according to Sport Bild.

arts.ttl: RB Leipzig will have to sell several big name players if miss out on Champions League football
arts.sum: Sport Bild reports that RB Leipzig could face serious changes this summer if they fail to qualify for the Champions League as the club sank to sixth at the weekend. Regular…

arts.ttl: Decisive weeks ahead for RB Leipzig
arts.sum: RB Leipzig have won just one of their last seven Bundesliga games, which has allowed Freiburg and Mainz to overtake the Saxony club in the race for the final Champions…
